name: Drive Drift － Training your Racing Skills
name_original: Drive Drift － Training your Racing Skills
description:
In this cool challenging driving game,learn how to drift!
Choose your car and complete the missions with your drift car.
In every level,create a donut within the indicated area,try not to hit the obstacles and pedestrians that are standing around.
Be careful the faster you go,the bigger the circle will be.
Accomplish your goal before time runs out and unlock new cars.Enjoy!
